betterquesting:10.desc:8:
With your upgraded wand you will be able to make your dream of combining the best of the arcane and crucible crafting worlds together a reality. That said the unstable nature of Essentia, used to fuel the most complex magic crafts you've performed to date, is worrying you.

You have plans drawn for how to make sure the process remains stable, but a method of telling exactly how stable "stable" is seems prudent.

The Arcane Abacus does just that. Right clicking a Runic Matrix will show the total stability, as well as list anything that is negatively affecting stability. Should an infusion recipe be laid out it will also show the base instability of it, as well as the essentia cost in specific cases like Runic Shielding Augmentation.

An Arcane Abacus can similarly be used on nodes to calculate the total amount of primal Vis contained within all it's aspects, though you're not sure what actually uses this information. Energizing nodes, for example, only cares about the highest source. Not the total.
